ExecutableTestSuite.label: Conformance Class 6: INSPIRE Interoperable Spatial Data Services metadata.
ExecutableTestSuite.description:
This test suite examines metadata records against the requirements for metadata in INSPIRE.

This is a draft version. It has limitations and is expected to contain errors. Please report any issues or problems in GitHub.

Known limitations are documented in the description of the applicable test case or test assertion.

There is a general limitation in all assertions that polymorphism and containment by reference (see the Technical Guidance, sub-clauses A.3, A.4 and A.5) are not supported. However, the current Abstract Test Suite does not support polymorphism and references either (all XPath expressions do not support polymorhism or references; in addition, schema validation is only executed against the ISO/OGC schemas without extensions). It is therefore unclear if this is really a limitation or if the sections in the technical guidance are outdated.

Source: Conformance Class 5'INSPIRE Interoperable Spatial Data Services metadata'

Pre-requisite conformance classes: Conformance Class 5
ExecutableTestSuite.author: Consortium Bilbomatica, Guadaltel y Geograma

ParameterList.name: ETF Standard Parameters for metadata XML test objects

TestCase.label: General Metadata
TestCase.description: Execute tests that apply for interopable services metadata records on elements that are directly child elements of the root node of the XML document: MD_Metadata node.

TestAssertion.label: md sds-interoperable 6.1: Coordinate Reference System element
TestAssertion.description:
It is checked that only the identifiers contained in a common record will be used to refer to the coordinate reference systems of a interoperable 'service'.

The multiplicity of this element is one or more.

Requirement involved:

  • TG MD 4.4.1.1 - Req 6.1

Source: Abstract Test Case 'Coordinate Reference System Identifier'
TestAssertion.expression: let $messages := (for $record in $records let $rid := $record/gmd:fileIdentifier/*/text() let $crsIdentifiers := $record/gmd:referenceSystemInfo/gmd:MD_ReferenceSystem/gmd:referenceSystemIdentifier/gmd:RS_Identifier return if (count($crsIdentifiers) = 0) then local:addMessage('TR.noCrsIdentifier', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid }) else for $crs in $crsIdentifiers let $code := $crs/gmd:code/*[1]/text() let $codeSpace := $crs/gmd:codeSpace/*[1]/text() return if (not(fn:string-length(normalize-space($code)) > 0)) then local:addMessage('TR.noCrsCode', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid, 'crs': $code }) else if (($crs/gmd:codeSpace) and (not(fn:string-length(normalize-space($codeSpace)) > 0))) then local:addMessage('TR.noCrsCodeSpace', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid, 'crs': $code }) else () )[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestAssertion.label: md sds-interoperable 6.2: Coordinate Reference System Identifier
TestAssertion.description:
It is checked that the value of the HTTP URI Identifier column is used as the value of referenceSystemIdentifier element.

The gmd:codeSpace element shall not be used in this case.

Requirement involved:

  • TG MD 4.4.1.1 - Req 6.2

Source: Abstract Test Case 'CRS http URIs'

TestCase.label: Identification
TestCase.description: Execute tests that apply for interoperable metadata records on elements that are child elements of the section of the XML document: Identification Info (property of the gmd:MD_Metadata element). This section contains information specific to the interoperable services.

TestAssertion.label: md sds-interoperable 6.3: Conditions Applying to Access and Use
TestAssertion.description:
Check the restrictions of access and use of the service through the element LegalConstraints, which is used to describe the non-technical access conditions and that.

The multiplicity of this element is one or more.

Requirement involved:

  • 4.4.2.1 - Req 6.3

Source: Abstract Test Case 'Conditions Applying to Access and Use '

In this test reference is made to some of the common requirements of the Technical Guide>

Common ATS: 'Conditions applying to access and use'
TestAssertion.expression:
let $messages := (for $record in $records let $rid := $record/gmd:fileIdentifier/*/text() let $legalConstraints := $record/gmd:identificationInfo/*/gmd:resourceConstraints/gmd:MD_LegalConstraints let $notPublicLimitConstraints := $record/gmd:identificationInfo/*/gmd:resourceConstraints/gmd:MD_LegalConstraints[ not( ./gmd:otherConstraints/gmx:Anchor/@xlink:href='http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/metadata-codelist/LimitationsOnPublicAccess/noLimitations') ] let $constrainType := $notPublicLimitConstraints[./gmd:useConstraints or ./gmd:accessConstraints] let $restrictionCode := $constrainType[./*/gmd:MD_RestrictionCode/@codeList = 'http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_RestrictionCode' and ./*/gmd:MD_RestrictionCode/@codeListValue = 'otherRestrictions' ]
return if ( not($constrainType) ) then local:addMessage('TR.noConstraintType', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid }) else if ( not($restrictionCode) ) then local:addMessage('TR.missingRestrictionCode', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid }) else( for $const in $constrainType let $otherConstraint := $const/gmd:otherConstraints let $validLinks := ('http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/metadata-codelist/ConditionsApplyingToAccessAndUse/noConditionsApply', 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/metadata-codelist/ConditionsApplyingToAccessAndUse/conditionsUnknown')
return if( not($otherConstraint) ) then local:addMessage('TR.missingOtherConstraints', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid }) else if (not( ($otherConstraint/gmx:Anchor/@xlink:href = $validLinks) or ($otherConstraint[string-length(normalize-space(text())) > 0]) ) ) then local:addMessage('TR.notValidOtherConstraints', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid }) else() )
)[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestAssertion.label: md sds-interoperable 6.4: Responsible Party
TestAssertion.description:
This information is verified through the element Point Of Contact.

This element shall be coded through the following child elements: gmd:CI_RoleCode, gmd:organisationName, gmd:electronicMailAddress.

Requirement involved:

  • TG MD,4.4.2.2 - Req 6.4

Source: Abstract Test Case 'Responsible Party'

In this test reference is made to some of the common requirements of the Technical Guide>

Common ATS: 'Responsible Organisation'
TestAssertion.expression:
let $messages := (for $record in $records let $rid := $record/gmd:fileIdentifier/*/text() let $party := $record/gmd:identificationInfo/srv:SV_ServiceIdentification/gmd:pointOfContact/gmd:CI_ResponsibleParty return if (count($party) = 0) then local:addMessage('TR.noParty', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid }) else for $part in $party let $role := $part/gmd:role/gmd:CI_RoleCode let $codeList := $part/gmd:role/gmd:CI_RoleCode/@codeList let $codeListValue := $part/gmd:role/gmd:CI_RoleCode/@codeListValue let $orgName := $part/gmd:organisationName//text() let $mail := $part/gmd:contactInfo/gmd:CI_Contact/gmd:address/gmd:CI_Address/gmd:electronicMailAddress//text()
return if (not($role)) then local:addMessage('TR.noRoleElement', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid, 'role': $role }) else if (not($codeList='http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#CI_RoleCode')) then local:addMessage('TR.invalidCodeList', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid, 'role': $role }) else if (not($codeListValue='custodian')) then local:addMessage('TR.invalidCodeListValue', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid, 'role': $role }) else if (not(fn:string-length(normalize-space($orgName)))) then local:addMessage('TR.noOrgName', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid, 'role': $role }) else if (not(fn:string-length(normalize-space($mail)))) then local:addMessage('TR.TR.noMailElement', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid, 'role': $role }) else () )[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestCase.label: Data Quality
TestCase.description: Execute tests that apply for harmonised services metadata records on elements that are child elements of the section of the XML document: Data Quality Information (property of the gmd:MD_Metadata element). This section contains information specific to the quality and lineage (including processing steps and sources) of the resource.

TestAssertion.label: md sds-interoperable 6.5: Minimum estimated Quality of Service
TestAssertion.description:
The minimum values for each of the quality of service criteria are evaluated using a Conceptual Consistency element within the gmd element DQ_DataQuality, with scope for the entire service.

Requirement involved:

  • TG MD 4.4.3.1 - Req 6.5

Source: Abstract Test Case 'Quality of Service'
TestAssertion.expression:
let $messages := (for $record in $records let $rid := $record/gmd:fileIdentifier/*/text() let $results := $record/gmd:dataQualityInfo/gmd:DQ_DataQuality/gmd:report/gmd:DQ_ConceptualConsistency return if (count($results) = 0) then local:addMessage('TR.noQualityOfService', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid }) else for $result in $results let $measureName := $result/gmd:nameOfMeasure//text() let $measureNameAnchor := $result/gmd:nameOfMeasure/gmx:Anchor/@xlink:href let $description := $result/gmd:measureDescription//text() let $quantitativeResult := $result/gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult let $valueUnit := $result/gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult/gmd:valueUnit/@xlink:href let $valueRecord := $result/gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult/gmd:value/gco:Record let $validation1 := $result[(./gmd:nameOfMeasure/gmx:Anchor/@xlink:href = 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/metadata-codelist/QualityOfServiceCriteriaCode/availability') and (./gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult/gmd:value/gco:Record/@xsi:type = ('xs:double','xsi:double')) and (data(./gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult/gmd:value/gco:Record) >= 0) and (data(./gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult/gmd:value/gco:Record) <= 100) and (./gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult/gmd:valueUnit/@xlink:href = 'urn:ogc:def:uom:OGC::percent')] let $validation2 := $result[(./gmd:nameOfMeasure/gmx:Anchor/@xlink:href = 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/metadata-codelist/QualityOfServiceCriteriaCode/performance') and (./gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult/gmd:value/gco:Record/@xsi:type = ('xs:double','xsi:double')) and (./gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult/gmd:valueUnit/@xlink:href = 'http://www.opengis.net/def/uom/SI/second')] let $validation3 := $result[(./gmd:nameOfMeasure/gmx:Anchor/@xlink:href = 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/metadata-codelist/QualityOfServiceCriteriaCode/capacity') and (./gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult/gmd:value/gco:Record/@xsi:type = ('xs:integer','xsi:integer')) and (./gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult/gmd:valueUnit/@xlink:href = 'http://www.opengis.net/def/uom/OGC/1.0/unity')]
return if (not($measureName)) then local:addMessage('TR.noMeasureName', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid, 'measureName': $measureName }) else if (not($description)) then local:addMessage('TR.noMeasureDescription', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid, 'measureName': $measureName }) else if (not($quantitativeResult)) then local:addMessage('TR.noQuantitativeResult', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid, 'measureName': $measureName }) else if (not($measureNameAnchor)) then local:addMessage('TR.noMeasureNameAnchor', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid, 'measureName': $measureName }) else if (not($valueUnit)) then local:addMessage('TR.noValueUnit', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid, 'measureName': $measureName }) else if (not($valueRecord)) then local:addMessage('TR.noValueRecord', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid, 'measureName': $measureName }) else if (not(($validation1) or ($validation2) or ($validation3))) then local:addMessage('TR.invalidQualityCriteria', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid, 'measureName': $measureName }) else () )[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)
